actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require that radio and television receivers meet certain technical standards for filtering out interference.

summary.text: Gives the Federal Communications Commission authority under the Communications Act of 1934, to require that radio and television receivers meet prescribed technical standards for filtering out interference. (Adds 47 U.S.C. 303 (s)(2))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require that radio and television receivers meet certain technical standards for filtering out interference.
